availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Sweeney (1st ky cavalry regiment)

body.p: Born in 1824 Kentucky. Married to Mildred Sweeney. Children included Ella, Aliva, Edmon, Ida, and Thales. Enlisted in First Kentucky Cavalry Regiment on July 17, 1861. Elected Captain Company organization. Mustered out April 14, 1862.

bibl.p: Sergeant E. Tarrant, The Wild Riders of the First Kentucky Cavalry : a History of the Regiment, in the Great War of the Rebellion, 1861-1865 : Pathetic Scenes, Amusing Incidents, and Thrilling Episodes, a Regimental Roster, Prison Life, Adventures, and Escapes (New York: New York Public Library, 1894), 395; Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, , Casey, District 9, ED 18, sheet 661A, NARA microfilm publication T9 (Washington D.C.: National Archives and Records Administration, n.d.), roll 0408; FHL microfilm 1,254,408.
